name: Savior of Light (itch)
description:
Savior of Light is a 2D top-down action adventure game made for MAGD 488 as the final project. It was made by the following students: 

- Cole Miller (Programmer, Sound, Music, Dialogue)

- Eliza Mustell (Programmer): EMGame - itch.io

- Lorissa Unglaub (Artist): 

- Kyle Grzyb (Artist, Dialogue): https://www.artstation.com/doinksoulz

- Nick Spaethe (Artist): https://spaethenick.wixsite.com/artwork
